channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: On this episode of 3ABN Today, we explore the inspiring ministry of NAD Jewish Ministries with Ralph Ringer, NAD Jewish Ministries Coordinator, and Dr. Alexander Bolotnikov, Speaker/Director of Shalom Media. Discover how the gospel is being shared through five key areas of outreach-centers of influence, Jewish Adventist congregations, evangelistic meetings, Jewish-friendly programs, and the digital and print ministry of the Shalom Learning Center.
